languages.text: {n}Мейв поднимает на вас взгляд — грустный и благодарный одновременно — и несмело улыбается.{/n}
{n}Maive looks up at you, sad and grateful at the same time, and smiles uncertainly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв поднимает на вас взгляд — грустный и благодарный одновременно — и несмело улыбается.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙抬起头看着你，目光既悲伤、又感激，随后露出了有些犹豫的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive looks up at you, sad and grateful at the same time, and smiles uncertainly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙抬起头看着你，目光既悲伤、又感激，随后露出了有些犹豫的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive levanta la vista hacia ti, una mirada a la vez triste y agradecida, y esboza una sonrisa indecisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive looks up at you, sad and grateful at the same time, and smiles uncertainly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive levanta la vista hacia ti, una mirada a la vez triste y agradecida, y esboza una sonrisa indecisa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sana bakan Maive, aynı anda hem üzgün hem de minnettar olup belirsizce gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive looks up at you, sad and grateful at the same time, and smiles uncertainly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana bakan Maive, aynı anda hem üzgün hem de minnettar olup belirsizce gülümsüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴはあなたを悲しそうに、同時に感謝するように見上げ、自信なさげに微笑む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive looks up at you, sad and grateful at the same time, and smiles uncertainly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴはあなたを悲しそうに、同時に感謝するように見上げ、自信なさげに微笑む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive lève vers vous un regard triste et reconnaissant à la fois, suivi d'un sourire hésitant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive looks up at you, sad and grateful at the same time, and smiles uncertainly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive lève vers vous un regard triste et reconnaissant à la fois, suivi d'un sourire hésitant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive blickt traurig und dankbar zugleich zu dir auf und lächelt unsicher.{/n}
